name: Army Truck 2
detailed_description:
How the most notorious mercenaries spend their leisure time? They participate in mad car crashing competitions! This is a deathmatch game where you have to bring maximum damage to your rivals by crashing into them, shooting them and even electrocuting them. It takes a decent military truck and a good driver to win the battle!
The more destruction you bring to the hostile trucks, the more points you get! And the more points you have, the more upgrade options await you.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Behold the breath-taking car combat;
  • Modify and upgrade your vehicle;
  • Crash into other trucks or use various weaponry — machine guns, missiles, high-voltage generators;
  • Visit several different locations to unleash your destructive power.

short_description: How the most notorious mercenaries spend their leisure time? They participate in mad car crashing competitions! Join the deathmatch and destroy your rivals by crashing into them and damaging them by other possible means.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
